channel.title: CVE Feed for VeronaLabs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VeronaLabs -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-24881|2024-02-08T11:19:21.541Z -- VeronaLabs -- WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc: from n/a through 6.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-34811|2024-05-13T08:36:01.792Z -- VeronaLabs -- WP SMS
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.5.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-30454|2024-03-29T16:30:14.635Z -- VeronaLabs -- WP SMS
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-25920|2024-03-27T05:45:44.417Z -- VeronaLabs -- WP SMS
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP SMS: from n/a through 6.3.4.
